message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its unique value and features, I'm asking for $22,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.

Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I think $22,000 is a bit steep for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $18,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  However,  $22,000 is closer to the true value of this product. I'm willing to come down slightly to $20,000. This is my final offer.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price. However, $20,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $19,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to me.
